Title: Creates deductions for creation or improvements of child care facilities
Summary: Creates deduction from franchise tax and personal income tax for costs of acquiring or improving child care facility operated for profit; creates deduction from corporation tax, franchise tax, personal income tax and tax on banks for costs of acquiring or improving a child care facility operated primarily for children of taxpayer's employees.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing tax deductions for expenditures made to purchase, construct, renovate or remodel child care facilities
